common.pageDescription: Bridging allows you to securely digitize your certificates.
common.nonAdminMessage: Bridging is only available for administrators. Request admin permissions to bridge.

bridgeIn.notEnoughPermission: Request admin permissions to reveal instructions
bridgeIn.narTransferInstructions:
1. Send your certificates to {{accountId}} {{registry}} registry account.
  2. You will be requested to confirm the transaction to complete the process.
  3. Only eligible credits can be pooled. For an EAT to be eligible, it must be Green-E certified and be a REC (not GO or IREC).
    • For pooling into JLT-F23, vintage must be from January 1st to June 30th 2023.
    • For pooling into JLT-B23, vintage must be from July 1st to December 31st 2023.
  4. Credits that are not pooled cannot be traded, only bridged off or retired.
bridgeIn.bridgingHint: Bridging in may take up to one business day after confirmation.

bridgeOut.info: Your bridging balance is independent of trading activity and can be utilized at any time.
bridgeOut.assetInfo: Only assets with a balance will be displayed in the list.
bridgeOut.accountInfoText: The credits will be sent to the registry account associated with your company.

summary.title: Summary
summary.placeholderText: Add credits on the bridge list
summary.summaryDescription: You can expect the credit to be deposited into your registry account within one business day after submitting the request.

backdrops.bridgingHint: Bridging may take up to 1 min. Please wait until process is completed.
backdrops.bridgeInSuccessSubtitle: Your balances have been updated. There could be delays in displaying transactions in the history.
backdrops.bridgeOutSuccessSubtitle: You can check the status of your transaction in the Open Requests section.
